title: Rose Petals
alternative_title: Bara no Hanabira ; ばらのはなびら ; 诉情的玫瑰花瓣
status: Bara no Hanabira ; ばらのはなびら ; 诉情的玫瑰花瓣
description:
Description :
        Arashidani admires his gentle co-worker Shirakesawa, but when his pushy boss Hosaka discovers his feelings, Arashidani finds himself swept into a passionate relationship. Unnerved by the depth of his emotions, Arashidani struggles to suppress his insecurities.
